weather_report:
In the serene embrace of a San Francisco afternoon, the city basks under a bright, unclouded sky that radiates a soft blue. The air is crisp, a gentle caress, as a light northwesterly breeze stirs, offering a refreshing contrast to the warmth of the sun. The temperature, striving for a comfortable 63, hints at a pleasant day ahead, though it subtly dances towards a cooler whisper as the afternoon progresses. Clarity reigns supreme, with the majestic outline of the Golden Gate Bridge visible against the shimmering bay, the marine layer maintaining its distance, allowing this rare clarity to envelop the city.

As the sun dips lower, it will transition to a night that promises a tranquil coolness, with the temperature settling around 49, where layers will be your ally. A light jacket or sweater would serve you well should you venture out, particularly as the evening unveils its starry canvas. The charm of the day invites leisurely strolls along the Embarcadero or quiet moments in one of the city's many cozy cafés, savoring a warming brew. Embrace the calm and beauty of this unique winter day, as it perfectly encapsulates the ever-enigmatic spirit of San Francisco.
